Are people actually upset over discussing multiparty systems?

The conversation is helpful for understanding difference among Dems.

People are acting like a Dem didn’t just join the GOP a few wks ago. Other safe Dems actually fundraise for Republicans. That’s not “moderate.”

In the meantime, the Administration needs to bring any discussion of war with Iran to the American people and their representatives in Congress, as the Constitution requires.

As a former prosecutor, I know that a trial is about getting to the truth. That means we need to hear from witnesses with direct knowledge of Trump's misconduct—including Bolton.

If Republicans vote to prevent any witness testimony, then it's clear they’re part of the cover-up.

In this country, access to a high-quality education too often depends on the zip code a child lives in and the size of their family’s bank account. I'm running for president to change that. Every child in America deserves a great public education. https://corybooker.com/issues/public-education/corys-plan-for-a-great-public-school-in-every-community-and-opportunity-for-every-child/

Insulin costs 10 times more in the U.S. than in Canada.

For the same damn product made by the same damn company, Americans are charged 10 times more.

We are going to end that thievery in this country.

Bankruptcy law places certain spending limitations on people while they’re in the process of bankruptcy. My plan pares back some of those burdensome limits—like those that prevent families from paying rent—so families have a chance to recover after the bankruptcy process.
We need more jobs and education. Not more jails and incarceration.

My plan starts by making it easier for people being crushed by debt to obtain relief through bankruptcy by streamlining the process, reducing the costs of filing, and giving people more flexibility in bankruptcy to find solutions that match their financial problems.

I agree. The U.S. must abide by international humanitarian law – it’s both shameful and dangerous that POTUS is stating otherwise, and that Senate Republicans have enabled this behavior by blocking this important resolution. https://twitter.com/SenMarkey/status/1214651385301684242 QT @SenMarkey On the Senate floor asking for passage of my resolution that says one simple thing: “attacks on cultural sites are war crimes.”
